search_results.title: Bio
search_results.snippet: Ivy Pochoda is the author of the critically acclaimed novels Wonder Valley, Visitation Street, These Women, and Sing Her Down which won the LA Times Book Prize.

search_results.title: Ivy Ruckman
search_results.snippet: Ivy Ruckman (May 25, 1931 – June 8, 2021), formally Iva Mae Myers Ruckman, was an American author of books for children and young adults.

search_results.title: Ivy Wilson: Department of English - Northwestern University
